channel.title: Help With Manifest for client
channel.description:
Hi there i need help with adding a manifest to my main java file and compile them i dont know the manifest code for starters it would be good if someone could just post the manifest code and for seconds how do i add it to make it open a java file? =] if any of u can supply this information it would be greatly appreciated : manifest code to open a java file that needs run.bat to open like mopar client 3.2w/aryan has one like that thanks =] please reply fast =[
like how u just double click the moparscape client and it opens : the java file i want to add a manifest to another server client to make it open by double clicking or i cant play it idk the code and idk how to add it to the java file answer those two pl0xxiesss ill check this everyday
